state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to take a trip west. After that, take a trip north. And then, attempt to take a trip west. After that, make an attempt to venture north. After that, recover the Canadian limited edition passkey from the floor of the shower. And then, unlock the Canadian limited edition door with the Canadian limited edition passkey. Then, make sure that the Canadian limited edition door is open. Then, head north. If you can accomplish that, head east. And then, head north. Then, make an effort to head west. Then, attempt to head west. With that over with, make an effort to go to the south. After that, pick-up the shadfly from the floor of the bedroom. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Restroom =- You find yourself in a restroom. A normal kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. What's that over there? It looks like it's a cabinet. What a letdown! The cabinet is empty! There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Restroom =-0/1
next_state: -= Cubicle =- You are in a cubicle. It seems to be pretty ordinary here. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You can see an opened suitcase. The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day! There is an open portal leading north. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Cubicle =-0/2
